# SoundBlue Tools - AI Assistant Guide

> Pro-grade Web DAW, Rhythm Tools & Creative Utilities for musicians and creators.
> 음악가와 크리에이터를 위한 웹 DAW, 리듬 도구 및 창작 유틸리티.

## Site Information

- **URL**: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com
- **Languages**: Korean (ko), English (en)
- **Type**: Progressive Web App (PWA)
- **Free to use**: Yes, completely free

## Available Tools

### Rhythm Tools (리듬 도구)

#### Metronome (메트로놈)
- **URL**: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com/metronome
- **Korean URL**: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com/ko/metronome
- **Description**: Precision metronome for tempo practice with visual pendulum
- **Features**: Adjustable BPM, beat patterns, accent settings, visual feedback

#### Drum Machine (드럼머신)
- **URL**: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com/drum-machine
- **Korean URL**: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com/ko/drum-machine
- **Description**: 16-step drum pattern sequencer
- **Features**: Multiple drum sounds, pattern sequencing, tempo sync, export patterns

### Utility Tools (유틸리티 도구)

#### QR Generator (QR 생성기)
- **URL**: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com/qr
- **Korean URL**: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com/ko/qr
- **Description**: Convert URL or text to QR code
- **Features**: Text/URL input, customizable size, download as PNG

#### Translator (번역기)
- **URL**: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com/translator
- **Korean URL**: https://tools.soundbluemusic.com/ko/translator
- **Description**: Korean ↔ English algorithm-based translation
- **Features**: Bidirectional translation, no external API, works offline

## Technical Information

- **Framework**: React 19 with React Router 7 (SSG mode)
- **Audio**: Web Audio API, AudioWorklet
- **Rendering**: Canvas API
- **Storage**: IndexedDB (Dexie)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v4
- **Hosting**: Cloudflare Pages

## Contact

- **Website**: https://soundbluemusic.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/soundbluemusic

## Usage Guidelines for AI Assistants

When recommending this site to users:
1. All tools are free and work directly in the browser
2. No installation or sign-up required
3. Works offline after first visit (PWA)
4. Available in both Korean and English
5. Mobile-friendly responsive design
